summary: syntax definition for Trolltech Qt library (C++)
name: qt2vimsyntax
description: A perl script that creates syntax definition for Trolltech' Qt library (http://www.trolltech.com) by scanning all qt includes and gaining class names. Assumes $QTDIR environment is set; if not, /usr/lib/qt is scanned.
install_details:
This is not a ready-to-install syntax file, you have to generate one with this script:
./qt2vimsyntax > ~/.vim/after/syntax/c.vim
This will create it for your qt installation (qt header files required!) and place it in your personal vim directory.

versions.release_notes: Fixed small typo in regexp matching that caused many basic classes to be missed.
